Sentencas: This paper presents an analysis of the effects of heat sources on performance of a planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Heat sources in SOFCs include ohmic heat losses, heat released by chemical and electrochemical processes and radiation.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: We take into account the first three types of heat source here while neglecting the last type as it is supposed to be negligibly small.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cell is working under conditions of direct internal reforming of methane and with co-flow configuration.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The composite electrodes are dis-cretized allowing the heat source associated with the electrochemical processes to be implemented in a layer of finite thickness.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Two cases are investigated, one where the electrochemical heat source is implemented on the anode side (base case) and another where it is implemented on the cathode side.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Results for temperature, current density and chemical species distribution of the base case are shown and discussed.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the effects of magnitude and location of the heat sources are discussed.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that including ohmic heating in the cell model does have a significant effect on the predicted cell performance.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Comparisons between the two cases indicate that the location of the electrochemical heat source does not affect the cell performance.
Titulo: Effects of heat sources on the performance of a planar solid oxide fuel cell
